trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Fowler
There were no other sightings in Fowler on or around March 5th 2006
divs: Sighting Detailsat the time of the incident my wife and I were awakened by the sound of our four dogs barking excitedly, what really startled us was that they were all staring towards the same direction of north in the sky ; which was the first time my own animals made created a eerie feeling . it seemed to surreal of a sight as if the red glowing animated ball of emitting light was hovering within the stratosphere without a sound to us but obviously ; if you are familiar with the sensitive hearing of dogs , then you would probably understand. as if they were in a barking trance , continually for over 5 minutes and suddenly it disappeared only to resurface approximately 2-3 min. later ;along with the barking again . in total it appeared 3 different times until if finally never appeared again, lasting around ten min. all together. in amazement, I happen to come across an article on the mufon web site stating in fowler ca. ;near fresno ca. that had been reported a few years later of a very shockingly similar siting and that is what prompted me to report my story.
